mapper.update:
update T_SES_EMS_EXP_EXTRACT_RECORD
PROJECT_NAME = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_CODE = #{projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCUREMENT_DEP_ID = #{procurementDepId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTRACTION_TIME = #{extractionTime,jdbcType=DATE},
EXTRACTION_SITES = #{extractionSites,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

EXTRACTS_THE_NUMBER = #{extractsTheNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTRACTING_CONDITIONS = #{extractingConditions,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=DATE},
EXTRACTS_PEOPLE = #{extractsPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
